title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Plane Geometry Learning Design Based on Realistic Geometry Models

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental geometric concepts and formulas, along with mathematical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the geometric properties of plane figures with over 80% accuracy through real-world examples.
Learners can solve spatial problems encountered in daily life by applying plane geometry calculations.
Learners can achieve over 75% proficiency in project-based assessments and solve complex geometric problems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
